name: Taking Out The Trash (beautiepie)
description:
You are someone on a very urgent mission. That mission is to take care of some very bloody trash. Jump your way to a safe disposal site and drop this important package where it belongs.

As you travel around, you will have a friend or two hovering over your shoulder, pay them no mind, they only want revenge.

This was created for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Sounds from zapsplat.com
